name: VR Flush
description: You are sitting on a toilet when you are abducted and beamed up to an alien spaceship, where you have to convince an A.I. that you really are an intelligent lifeform.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows  8.1 or higher Processor: Intel i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200, FX4350 or  higher Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970  or AMD Radeon R9 290 Storage: 800 MB available space Additional Notes: Oculus Rift or HTC Vive VR Headset, but the game can be played on your screen as well.
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
